column1: Select whether or not you want to let the public (visitors that are not logged-in) to view the following sections of your social network. In some cases (such as Profiles, Feedback, and Albums), if you have given them the option, your users will be able to make their pages private even though you have made them publically viewable here. For more permissions settings, please visit the General Settings page.
column2: Select whether or not you want to let the public (visitors that are not logged-in) to view the following sections of your social network. In some cases (such as Profiles, Feedback, and Albums), if you have given them the option, your users will be able to make their pages private even though you have made them publically viewable here. For more permissions settings, please visit the General Settings page.

column1: Choose pictures from your computer to add to this feedback. (2MB maximum)

This email is sent to the member when someone create a new feedback.

Available placeholders:
[feedback_title], [feedback_owner], [feedback_status], [feedback_date], [email], [link]

Hello Admin,

New [feedback_status] feedback '[feedback_title]' is created by [feedback_owner] on [feedback_date] to view this feedback please click on [link].

Best Regards,
Social Network Administration
